mapper.insert: insert into COMIC_COMMENTS (CMNT_NUM, CMNT_BOARDNUM, CMNT_CONTENT, CMNT_ID, CMNT_DATE) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(CMNT_NUM),0)+1 from COMIC_COMMENTS), #{CMNT_BOARDNUM}, #{CMNT_CONTENT}, #{CMNT_ID}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update COMIC_COMMENTS set CMNT_CONTENT = #{CMNT_CONTENT}, CMNT_DATE = sysdate where CMNT_NUM=#{CMNT_NUM}
mapper.select: select count(CMNT_NUM) from COMIC_COMMENTS where CMNT_BOARDNUM= #{CMNT_BOARDNUM}
